trans-unit.source: Allows a customized view of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListView" /> that derives from <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ViewBase" /> to implement automation peer features that are specific to the custom view.
trans-unit.target: 允許衍生自 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListView" /> 之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ViewBase" /> 的自訂檢視實作自訂檢視專屬的自動化對等功能。

trans-unit.source: The following code shows a custom view implementing <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.IViewAutomationPeer> in a separate class to handle a button that appears at the top of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼顯示自訂檢視，實作<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.IViewAutomationPeer>在個別的類別來處理出現在頂端的按鈕<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem" /> that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListView" /> that is used by this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.IViewAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem" />，與這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListView" /> 所使用的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.IViewAutomationPeer" /> 相關聯。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets the control type for the element that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.IViewAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得與此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.IViewAutomationPeer" /> 相關聯之項目的控制項型別。

trans-unit.source: The automation peers for the list items.
trans-unit.target: 清單項目的自動化對等。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of immediate child elements of the specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] peer.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定之 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]對等個體的直接子項目集合。

trans-unit.source: The automation peers for all items in the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項中所有項目的自動化對等。

trans-unit.source: If the view contains interactive or informational elements in addition to the list items, automation peers for these elements must be added to the list.
trans-unit.target: 如果檢視中除了清單項目 (Item) 之外還包含互動或資訊項目 (Element)，則必須將這些項目 (Element) 的自動化對等加入清單中。

trans-unit.source: Gets the control pattern that is associated with the specified <paramref name="patternInterface" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得與指定之 <paramref name="patternInterface" /> 相關聯的控制項模式。

trans-unit.source: Return the object that implements the control pattern.
trans-unit.target: 傳回實作控制項模式的物件。

trans-unit.source: If this method returns null, the return value from <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.IViewAutomationPeer.GetPattern(System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface)" /> is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個方法傳回 null，則會使用來自 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.IViewAutomationPeer.GetPattern(System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface)" /> 的傳回值。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.NotifyCollectionChangedEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Called by <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListView" /> when the collection of items changes.
trans-unit.target: 當項目集合變更時，由 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListView" /> 呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Called when the custom view is no longer applied to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListView" />.
trans-unit.target: 當自訂檢視不再套用至 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListView" /> 時呼叫。
